definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: Bonobos have developed a set of ritualized socio-sexual behaviors that are specific to their species.
sentences.chinese: 倭黑猩猩已經形成了一套自己獨特的社交性行爲。

sentences.english: "I hope bonobos win... it will be better for everyone," he added.
sentences.chinese: 我希望倭黑猩猩的一面多一點，這樣對大家更好些。

sentences.english: But then again, we’re hardly as sexually carefree as bonobos.
sentences.chinese: 但是另一方面，我們很難像倭黑猩猩那樣的“開放”。

sentences.english: The most aggressive apes of all were the bonobos.
sentences.chinese: 所有的猿類中最具攻擊性的是倭黑猩猩。

sentences.english: The most aggressive apes of all were the bonobos .
sentences.chinese: 所有的猿類中最具攻擊性的是倭黑猩猩。

sentences.english: The bonobo is a type of ape.
Sex is the solution to all of the bonobos’ problems.
sentences.chinese: 亂搞是倭黑猩猩解決一切問題的靈丹妙藥。

sentences.english: Humans do it, of course. As do bonobos, our close relatives.
sentences.chinese: 當然人類是好這一口的，跟我們的近親倭黑猩猩一樣。

sentences.english: A young mouse lemur gets its daily sustenance from an eye - dropper.
sentences.chinese: 一隻年幼的倭狐猴從滴管裏吸食它的食物。

Tartar (derogatory)/also used as an insulting term for Manchus around 1900
